metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2469 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
GNU SASL libgsasl server-side read-out-of-bounds with maliciousauthenticated GSS-API client

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gsasl - 1.8.0-2ubuntu2+esm1
libgsasl7 - 1.8.0-2ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gsasl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-2ubuntu2+esm1').
